docs.text: This is XIPA API documentation With love only for Zhenyok The base URL is: https://api.xipa.ru How to use POST or GET or PUT or DELETE requests Use HTTP method for CRUD metolodogy. If you`re creating something, use POST . If you`re reading (getting) something, use GET If you`re updating something, use PUT If you`re deleting something, use DELETE Rate limits First you need to know that the server is rate limited. It means that every HTTP client can send limited requests per time unit. You can see rate limit info in response headers Header name Description X-RateLimit-Limit Amount of total requests that you can send X-RateLimit-Remaining Amount of requests that you can send Retry-After Timestamp when you can retry Validation Do data validation in client before send it to API If client sends invalid data server will return a string with validation errors. Each one starts with new line
docs.title: Home

docs.text: With love only for Zhenyok
docs.title: This is XIPA API documentation

docs.text: https://api.xipa.ru
docs.title: The base URL is:

docs.text: Use HTTP method for CRUD metolodogy. If you`re creating something, use POST . If you`re reading (getting) something, use GET If you`re updating something, use PUT If you`re deleting something, use DELETE
docs.title: POST or GET or PUT or DELETE requests

docs.text: First you need to know that the server is rate limited. It means that every HTTP client can send limited requests per time unit. You can see rate limit info in response headers Header name Description X-RateLimit-Limit Amount of total requests that you can send X-RateLimit-Remaining Amount of requests that you can send Retry-After Timestamp when you can retry
docs.title: Rate limits

docs.text: Do data validation in client before send it to API If client sends invalid data server will return a string with validation errors. Each one starts with new line
docs.title: Validation

docs.text: Cities The template is: <two-letter country code≶:<City name in lower-case letters only in English> I will project cities system in XIPA Services. For now, let`s make it as above. If you need, you can create a JSON file with country/city names and pretty city names
docs.title: Cities

docs.text: The template is: <two-letter country code≶:<City name in lower-case letters only in English> I will project cities system in XIPA Services. For now, let`s make it as above. If you need, you can create a JSON file with country/city names and pretty city names
docs.title: Cities

docs.text: File downloads To download a file (ex. user`s avatar or passport photos) you need a file name, that may be in, for example, user`s profile JSON. Use the base download link: https://dl.xipa.ru/ and append file name to this
docs.title: Downloads

docs.text: To download a file (ex. user`s avatar or passport photos) you need a file name, that may be in, for example, user`s profile JSON. Use the base download link: https://dl.xipa.ru/ and append file name to this
docs.title: File downloads

docs.text: Authorization Each sensitive request has to contain accessToken parameter. If it`s need to get accessToken for a user, you need: Required data field descrption username User`s username password User`s password URL GET /accessToken Response You will receive json with accessToken field { "accessToken": "c898404658d3ec32800a6d706ed7d23215bc93abb00ab8d828ef5d87ec513bf9" } Limits 3 requests per 15 minutes
docs.title: Authorization (getting token)

docs.text: Each sensitive request has to contain accessToken parameter. If it`s need to get accessToken for a user, you need:

docs.text: Getting account info You can get account info by it`s accessToken. Required data field descrption accessToken User`s access token URL GET /me Response For performers: { "_id": "6013e2839a4995a85411c20c", "firstName": "Алексей", "middleName": "Михайлович", "lastName": "Хордов", "inn": "999999999999", "personalID": "0713 827356", "balance": 3000, "city": "ru:moscow", "email": "wejoigjoiew@mail.ru", "username": "wejoigjoiew", "passportFiles": [ "upload_3d68c5b44c024776096e6389b83f0e4c.jpg", "upload_3c5889afe5a51590176b859598aacd56.png" ], "createdAt": "2021-01-29T10:25:07.607Z", "role": "performer", "verifyStatus": 0, "lastVisitAt": "2021-02-02T12:10:26.184Z" } For customers (no anketa filled): { "_id": "6019437886c50e3b0f46e6ad", "firstName": "Алексей", "email": "wejoigjoiefw@mail.ru", "username": "wejoigjoiefw", "balance": 3000, "createdAt": "2021-02-02T12:20:08.542Z", "role": "customer", "verifyStatus": 0, "lastVisitAt": "2021-02-02T12:21:57.322Z", } For customers (anketa filled): { "_id": "6019437886c50e3b0f46e6ad", "firstName": "Алексей", "email": "wejoigjoiefw@mail.ru", "username": "wejoigjoiefw", "balance": 3000, "createdAt": "2021-02-02T12:20:08.542Z", "role": "customer", "verifyStatus": 0, "lastVisitAt": "2021-02-02T12:21:57.322Z", "legalName": "ИП Алексеев Алексей Алексеевич", "inn": "999999999999", "ogrn": "9999999999999", "bik": "999999999", "bankName": "Sivitskiy`s Bank", "bankAccount": "99999999999999999999", "lawAddress": "Россия, Тверская область, г. Тверь, ул. Вокзальная д. 1", "zipAddress": "Россия, Тверская область, г. Тверь, ул. Вокзальная д. 1", "legalFIO": "Мазафаков Михаил Игоревич", "legalPosition": "Генеральный директор", "legalPurpose": "цлупзщукплузщлпщзуклцпр" } Limits 10 requests per 30 minutes

docs.text: Joining users There are POST request which allows everyone to subscribe XIPA news over E-Mail. If request is success, the letter will be dropped to info@xipa.ru Required data field description required firstName User`s firstname true email User`s email true comment Comment. Min 8 symbols false URL POST /join Response You will receive HTTP status code 201 Limits 3 requests per hour
docs.title: Sign up for project news

docs.text: There are POST request which allows everyone to subscribe XIPA news over E-Mail. If request is success, the letter will be dropped to info@xipa.ru
docs.title: Joining users

docs.text: You will receive HTTP status code 201
docs.title: Response

docs.text: 3 requests per hour

docs.text: Filling the customer`s anketa Send PUT request with required data. You can update anketa info at any time Required data Field Description Required legalName Полное имя юридического лица true inn ИНН true ogrn ОГРН (либо ОГРНИП, если ИПшник) true kpp КПП (у ИПшников его нет) false bik БИК true bankName Имя банка true bankAccount Номер расчётного счёта true bankKorrAccount Банковский корр. счёт true lawAddress Юридический адрес true zipAddress Почтовый адрес true legalFIO ФИО ответственного лица true legalPosition Должность ответственного лица true legalPurpose Основание ответственного лица true accessToken User`s access token true URL PUT /users/customer/anketa Response You will receive HTTP status code 201 Limits 10 requests per hour
docs.title: Filling user`s anketa

docs.text: Send PUT request with required data. You can update anketa info at any time
docs.title: Filling the customer`s anketa

docs.text: Register a customer Required data field description firstName User`s first name email User`s E-Mail URL POST /users/customer Response You will receive JSON with user`s accessToken { "accessToken": "c898404658d3ec32800a6d706ed7d23215bc93abb00ab8d828ef5d87ec513bf9" } Limits 3 requests per hour

docs.text: 3 requests per hour

docs.text: Check if performer exists Required data Send email or inn to check if performer does exist Field Description inn ИНН email E-Mail URL GET /users/performer/exists Response You will receive json boolean (true or false) true Limits 10 requests per 30 minutes

docs.text: Register a performer Required data Field Description Required firstName User`s first name true middleName User`s middle name true lastName User`s last name true personalID Паспорт. Серия и номер. Пример "0123 456789" true email User`s email true inn ИНН true city See at cities page true passport1 FILE (passport main page) true passport2 FILE (passport propiska page) true URL POST /users/performer Response You will receive JSON with user`s accessToken. { "accessToken": "c898404658d3ec32800a6d706ed7d23215bc93abb00ab8d828ef5d87ec513bf9" } Limits 3 requests per 15 minutes
